message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a unique and valuable item that I think you'll really appreciate. Would you like to make an offer to purchase it for $1200000?
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I understand its value, but I am only able to offer $950000 for it at this time.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I am comfortable offering $1050000 for the product.
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I can see you're serious about the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. How about we settle on $1075000?
I'm glad we're making progress, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I believe $1060000 would be a fair price for us both.
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $1070000?
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. Considering the negotiations so far, I believe $1065000 would be a fair price for the product.
I think we're really close now, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1070000, but I'm not going to go any lower. How about we finalize the deal at $1070000?
